There will be enough volume of #covid19 vaccine to protect the world by end of 2022, Pfizer CEO predicts at #CNBCEvolve. Whether that means everyone will be vaccinated by then is another question, he says.

Developed countries secured Pfizer's #covid19 vaccine supply in advance; developing countries made plans on other vaccines rather than betting early on Pfizer, CEO says. In second half Pfizer will release 2B doses of #covid19 vaccine. "That's amazing," Bourla says. #CNBCEvolve
Pfizer hit 1B manufactured doses of #covid19 vaccine last week, CEO says at #CNBCEvolve. Expects to have them all released by end of month (700M released so far).

Antibody drugs for #covid19 were underused through the pandemic bc they’re IV (only now getting available as shots) & it was complicated for people just dx’d to get them.
